title: Voice Chat
body: League of legends definitely needs to have some form of voice chat, of course you're all thinking, "wait, everyone's just going to spam and ruin it" well possibly a overuse of the chat could cause a warning or mute much like ping abuse. Putting voice chat in league of legends would improve team communication, improving game play and individuals enjoyment in the game, it would also prevent the hassle of "setting up a team speak chat room" or finding that strangers Skype account. Voice chat definitely needs to be put in League of Legends, pls rito

replies.body:
If voice chat was introduced into league, instead of cyber bullying from toxic people, it will become a more serious problem such as verbal harassment and people leaving mic's on unintentionally or people just yelling jibrish into the mike being a 'troll'.
On the other hand it would be good for ranked 5v5's or pre made games where **communication** is key, previously stated in Connors argument.
Riot would also have to implement a system where people would be banned or punishments would be laid down to stop the abusive nature of some people who give a bad name to the league community.
